subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
Diving and Divers
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The masters of soccer seem unable to straighten out the mixed messages of diving and mauling that are dragging soccer down in front of the whole world.
snippet: The masters of soccer seem unable to straighten out the mixed messages of diving and mauling that are dragging soccer down in front of the whole world.
